type: Legendary Creature – Human Elder Knight Advisor
rules_text:
First strike, vigilance; Mentor
[i]Duty[/i] – Mycen, Valentia's Chancellor can't attack unless you control two other legendary creatures.
[i]Art of War[/i] – Whenever Mycen mentors a creature, that creature gains first strike until end of turn.
[i]Patient Council[/i] – {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}. Spend this mana only on legendary creature spells.
